resources:
Permissions On Android
>
NOT NOW CONTINUE
Camera access is required to display the camera preview. Camera permission was granted. Starting preview. Camera permission request was denied.
storage access is required to display the camera preview. storage permission was granted. Starting preview. storage permission request was denied.
**IGap** needs access to your contacts so that you can connect with your friends across all your devices. Your contacts will be continuously synced with IGap\'s heavily encrypted cloud servers. contacts permission was granted. Starting preview. contacts permission request was denied.
calendar access is required to display the camera preview. calendar permission was granted. Starting preview. calendar permission request was denied.
location access is required to display the camera preview. location permission was granted. Starting preview. location permission request was denied.
record audio access is required to display the camera preview. record audio permission was granted. Starting preview. record audio permission request was denied.
phone access is required to display the camera preview. phone permission was granted. Starting preview. phone permission request was denied.
OK
